languages.text: "Преподобный! Но это же еретики! Как есть еретики! Вся их планета чумная, там, говорят, все перемерли, а все почему? Они еретики и наказаны {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Преподобный! Но это же еретики! Как есть еретики! Вся их планета чумная, там, говорят, все перемерли, а все почему? Они еретики и наказаны Императором!"

languages.text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"
languages.original_text: "Преподобный! Но это же еретики! Как есть еретики! Вся их планета чумная, там, говорят, все перемерли, а все почему? Они еретики и наказаны {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Father! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the Emperor punished them!"
"Father! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the Emperor punished them!"
"Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the Emperor punished them!"
"Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the Emperor punished them!"

"Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

languages.text: 「司祭！ですが、こいつらは異端者です！本物の異端者ですよ！奴らの惑星は全体が穢されており、大勢の住民が死んだと聞きました。なぜだと思います？奴らが異端者だからですよ！だから{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が奴らを罰したんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

traits.locale_text: 「司祭！ですが、こいつらは異端者です！本物の異端者ですよ！奴らの惑星は全体が穢されており、大勢の住民が死んだと聞きました。なぜだと思います？奴らが異端者だからですよ！だから{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が奴らを罰したんだ！」

languages.text: “牧师！可这些人都是异端分子！真正的异端分子！他们整颗行星都爆发了瘟疫，人们都说所有人都死了！好好的行星怎么会爆发瘟疫，嗯？因为他们是异端分子！那是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的惩罚！”
languages.original_text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

traits.locale_text: “牧师！可这些人都是异端分子！真正的异端分子！他们整颗行星都爆发了瘟疫，人们都说所有人都死了！好好的行星怎么会爆发瘟疫，嗯？因为他们是异端分子！那是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的惩罚！”

languages.text: «¡Reverendo! ¡Pero son herejes! ¡Herejes de verdad! Su planeta entero está infectado; dicen las malas lenguas que allí no queda nadie vivo. ¿Y por qué será, eh? ¡Porque son herejes y el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} los ha castigado!».
languages.original_text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Reverendo! ¡Pero son herejes! ¡Herejes de verdad! Su planeta entero está infectado; dicen las malas lenguas que allí no queda nadie vivo. ¿Y por qué será, eh? ¡Porque son herejes y el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} los ha castigado!».

languages.text: « Révérend ! Ce sont des hérétiques, de véritables hérétiques ! Leur planète entière est pestiférée, il paraît que tout le monde est mort, là-bas ! Comment ça se fait, selon vous ? C'est parce que ce sont des hérétiques, et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} les a punis ! »
languages.original_text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

traits.locale_text: « Révérend ! Ce sont des hérétiques, de véritables hérétiques ! Leur planète entière est pestiférée, il paraît que tout le monde est mort, là-bas ! Comment ça se fait, selon vous ? C'est parce que ce sont des hérétiques, et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} les a punis ! »

languages.text: "Reverend! Das sind Ketzer! Echte Ketzer! Ihr ganzer Planet ist verseucht, es heißt, dort wären alle tot, und warum ist das wohl so, hm? Weil sie Ketzer sind und der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} sie bestraft hat!"
languages.original_text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

traits.locale_text: "Reverend! Das sind Ketzer! Echte Ketzer! Ihr ganzer Planet ist verseucht, es heißt, dort wären alle tot, und warum ist das wohl so, hm? Weil sie Ketzer sind und der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} sie bestraft hat!"

languages.text: "Tamam da muhterem, bunlar kâfir! Sahici kâfirler! Veba, gezegenlerini komple sarmış. Herkesin öldüğünü söylüyorlar. Peki niye? Çünkü kâfirler işte! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}, cezalarını vermiş!"
languages.original_text: "Reverend! But these are heretics! Real heretics! Their whole planet is plagued, folks say they all died over there, and why is that, huh? 'Cause they're heretics, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} punished them!"

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem! Bunlar kâfir! Gerçek kâfir! Gezegenlerini komple salgın kaplamış. Herkesin öldüğünü söylüyorlar. Neden peki ha? Çünkü bunlar kâfir ve {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} onları cezalandırmış!"
